edu.wpi.disco.game

Class NWayInteraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.disco.game.NWayInteraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoachedInteraction

    public class NWayInteraction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Models a conversation between multiple parties. This thread class runs as the "AI loop" of the game.
